41 #include <ros/ros.h>

43 #include "rosserial_server/session.h"

45 namespace rosserial_server
46 {
47 
48 class SerialSession : public Session<boost::asio::serial_port>
49 {
50 public:
51  SerialSession(boost::asio::io_service& io_service, std::string port, int baud, int tries = 10)
52  : Session(io_service), port_(port), baud_(baud), // io_service_(io_service),
53  timer_(io_service), interval_(boost::posix_time::milliseconds(1000)), tries_(tries)
54  {
55  connect_with_reconnection();
56  }
57 
58 private:
59  ~SerialSession()
60  {
61  ROS_WARN("Serial session shutting down. Waiting 1 second for system state to settle.");
62 
63  boost::shared_ptr<boost::asio::deadline_timer> timer
64  (new boost::asio::deadline_timer(
65  socket().get_io_service(),
66  boost::posix_time::seconds(1)));
67 
68  // The timer instance is only passed to the callback in order to keep it alive for the
69  // required lifetime. When the callback completes, it goes out of scope and is destructed.
70  timer->async_wait(
71  boost::bind(&SerialSession::restart_session,
72  boost::ref(socket().get_io_service()), port_, baud_, timer));
73  }
74 
75  static void restart_session(boost::asio::io_service& io_service, std::string port, int baud,
76  boost::shared_ptr<boost::asio::deadline_timer>& timer)
77  {
78  if (ros::ok()) {
79  ROS_INFO("Recreating serial session.");
80  new SerialSession(io_service, port, baud);
81  } else {
82  ROS_INFO("In shutdown, avoiding recreating serial session.");
83  }
84  }
85 
86  bool attempt_connection(bool log_errors = true)
87  {
88  if (log_errors) ROS_INFO("Opening serial port.");
89  boost::system::error_code ec;
90  socket().open(port_, ec);
91  if (ec) {
92  if (log_errors) ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Unable to open port " << port_);
93  return false;
94  }
95 
96  typedef boost::asio::serial_port_base serial;
97  socket().set_option(serial::baud_rate(baud_));
98  socket().set_option(serial::character_size(8));
99  socket().set_option(serial::stop_bits(serial::stop_bits::one));
100  socket().set_option(serial::parity(serial::parity::none));
101  socket().set_option(serial::flow_control(serial::flow_control::none));
102 
103  // Kick off the session.
104  start();
105  return true;
106  }
107 
108  void connect_with_reconnection(bool log_errors = true) {
109  if (!attempt_connection(log_errors)) {
110  if (log_errors) {
111  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Attempting reconnection every " << interval_.total_milliseconds() << " ms.");
112  }
113  if (tries_ != 0) {
114  timer_.expires_from_now(interval_);
115  timer_.async_wait(boost::bind(&SerialSession::connect_with_reconnection, this, false));
116  if (tries_ > 0) tries_--;
117  }
118  } else {
119  }
120  }
121 
122  std::string port_;
123  int baud_;
124  boost::posix_time::time_duration interval_;
125  boost::asio::deadline_timer timer_;
126  int tries_;
127 };
128 
129 } // namespace
